item.title: Wokeness Killed The Presidential Fitness Test. President Trump Should Bring it Back
item.description: It is no surprise that a test that rewards excellence did not survive the era of participation trophies.

item.title: Congress’s Adoption Tax Credit Legislation Is Pro-Life And Pro-Family
item.description: The Adoption Tax Credit Refundability Act will help ensure families have the opportunity to experience the joy that adoption brings.

item.title: How Supporting Postpartum Moms Could Boost Our Declining Fertility Rates
item.description: Failing to support a new mother as she suffers from postpartum depression will also affect her children and her future childbearing.

item.title: 12 Disqualifying Errors In Richard Hays’ ‘Biblical’ Case For Gay Relationships
item.description: 'The Widening of God’s Mercy' lacks a credible defense of its thesis and ignores the most important relevant biblical texts.

item.title: Hegseth Nomination Battle Shows Republicans An Easy Way To Stop Losing And Start Defeating The Swamp
item.description: These simple steps enable Republicans to blow up the awful playbook that the Democrats use to get their way.
